name: Test for adding a product to the favorites using the heart icon in the cart.
description: Test Description: Validates that a product can be added to the favorites by clicking the heart icon on the product card in the cart page.

steps.name: The heart icon on the product card is clicked, ensuring the product is added to the favorites.

labels.name: story
labels.value: Product Favorites: Verify that users can add a product to their favorites by clicking the heart icon on the product card.
